ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work was financially supported by the Slovenian Research Agency (Research Core Funding No. P4-0407, Project No. L4-9325 and program for young researchers in the accordance with » agreement on (co) financing research activity in 2018 « No. 1000-18-0105), Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Food and Domžale-Kamnik Wastewater Treatment Plant.We want to thank Dr. Matevž Rupar for designing the oligonucleotides used in the PCR assay and Dr. Magda Tušek Žnidarič for providing representative transmission electron microscopy micrograph of PVY NTN. The study was performed using ddPCR equipment financed by the Metrology Institute of the Republic of Slovenia (MIRS), with financial support from the European Regional Development Fund. This equipment is wholly owned by the Republic of Slovenia.
